Change.Title: Remove Zero and One from Numeric Traits
Change.Author: Michka Popoff
Change.Description:
Remove Zero and One from NumericTraits
These have been deprecated with warnings since 2012, and are removed for ITK 4.7 to clean up the API. ZeroValue() and OneValue() should be used instead.
